mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL, NAME, PASSWORD, PROFILE_IMG, ENROLL_DATE, LOCATION, SHORTDESCRIPTION, HOMEPAGE, PHONE1, PHONE2, PHONE3, STOP_DATE, STOP_DATE + 3 AS EXPDATE FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.update:
MERGE INTO PAYMENT_INFO P1 USING DUAL ON (P1.EMAIL = #{email}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET P1.P_METHOD = #{p_method}, P1.CARDNUM = #{cardnum}, P1.VALIDITY = #{validity}, P1.BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, P1.CARDPWD = #{cardpwd}
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (EMAIL, P_METHOD, CARDNUM, VALIDITY, BIRTHDAY, CARDPWD) VALUES(#{email},#{p_method},#{cardnum},#{validity},#{birthday},#{cardpwd})

MERGE INTO PAYMENT_INFO P1 USING DUAL ON (P1.EMAIL = #{email}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET P1.P_METHOD = #{p_method}, P1.BANK = #{bank}, P1.ACNAME = #{acname}, P1.ACINFO = #{acinfo}, P1.BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, P1.ACNUM = #{acnum}
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (EMAIL, P_METHOD, BANK, ACNAME, ACINFO, BIRTHDAY, ACNUM) VALUES(#{email},#{p_method},#{bank},#{acname},#{acinfo}, #{birthday},#{acnum})
